name: CreateCloudflareAccount
description:
Create a Cloudflare account through Datadog integration.

This tool is used to create a Cloudflare account using Datadog's integration API. It should be called when you wish to initiate a new Cloudflare account while leveraging Datadog services.

parameters.name: cloudflare_api_key
parameters.description: The API key or token for the Cloudflare account required to authenticate and connect with the Cloudflare service.

value_schema.description: The API key (or token) for the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: cloudflare_account_name
parameters.description: The name for the Cloudflare account to be created.

value_schema.description: The name of the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: json_api_type
parameters.description: Specifies the JSON:API type, must be 'cloudflare-accounts'.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `cloudflare-accounts`.

parameters.name: cloudflare_account_email
parameters.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. Required if using an API key instead of a token.

value_schema.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. If an API key is provided (and not a token), this field is also required.

parameters.name: resources_allowlist
parameters.description: List of resources such as 'web', 'dns', 'lb', or 'worker' to restrict metric pulling.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of resources to restrict pulling metrics for including `'web', 'dns', 'lb' (load balancer), 'worker'`.

parameters.name: zone_allowlist
parameters.description: A list of zones for restricting metric data collection.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of zones to restrict pulling metrics for.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.api_key
parameters.description: The API key (or token) for the Cloudflare account.

value_schema.description: The API key (or token) for the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.email
parameters.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. If an API key is provided (and not a token), this field is also required.

value_schema.description: The email associated with the Cloudflare account. If an API key is provided (and not a token), this field is also required.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: The name of the Cloudflare account.

value_schema.description: The name of the Cloudflare account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.resources
parameters.description: An allowlist of resources to restrict pulling metrics for including `'web', 'dns', 'lb' (load balancer), 'worker'`.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of resources to restrict pulling metrics for including `'web', 'dns', 'lb' (load balancer), 'worker'`.

parameters.name: data.attributes.zones
parameters.description: An allowlist of zones to restrict pulling metrics for.

value_schema.description: An allowlist of zones to restrict pulling metrics for.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `cloudflare-accounts`.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this API. Should always be `cloudflare-accounts`.
